import React, { useState } from 'react' import InputForm from '../InputForm/InputForm' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from "./Login.module.css" export default function Login() { const [values,setValues] = useState({ email:"", pass:"" }) return (
setValues((prev)=>({...prev,email:event.target.value}))}/> setValues((prev)=>({...prev,pass:event.target.value}))}/>
{errorMsg}

Already have an account? {" "}

Login
) }
